The following table shows you where to find guidance about the taxation of travelling and related subsistence payments in particular occupations.
**Guidance****Circumstance**
[EIM68610](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM68610)Travelling and subsistence allowances paid to recorders, circuit judges etc in England and Wales
[EIM50100](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM50000#EIM50100)Cost of leave travel facilities provided for the armed forces
Employment Status ManualTravelling expenses paid to workers supplied by agencies
[EIM62600](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM60000#EIM62600)Travelling and subsistence allowances paid to engineering design employees
[EIM70745](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM70199#EIM70745)Expenses paid to teachers for home to school travel when attending out of school functions
